prop.name: LargeButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip buttons in the large scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonLargeButton will be used.

prop.name: LargeDropdownButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip dropdown buttons in the large scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonLargeDropdownButton will be used.

prop.name: LargeSplitButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip split buttons in the large scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonLargeSplitButton will be used.

prop.name: SmallButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip buttons in the medium scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonSmallButton will be used.

prop.name: SmallDropdownButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip dropdown buttons in the medium scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonSmallDropdownButton will be used.

prop.name: SmallSplitButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip split buttons in the medium scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonSmallSplitButton will be used.

prop.name: SmallIconLabelTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for icon labels in the medium scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonSmallIconLabel will be used.

prop.name: IconButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip buttons in the small scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the ToolstripButton will be used.

prop.name: IconDropdownButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip dropdown buttons in the small scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the ToolstripDropdownButton will be used.

prop.name: IconSplitButtonTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for toolstrip split buttons in the small scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the ToolstripSplitButton will be used.

prop.name: IconLabelTemplate
prop.p: The assigned control template instance must be or derived from <ToolstripButtonTemplate/>.
This property defines a control template for icon labels in the small scale. If this property is empty, the default control template for the RibbonIconLabel will be used.
